text: Hi <@U31TA64TT> , When you use the HFC SDK, the user’s credentials (equivalent of a wallet) are stored locally in the KeyValueStore. This happens when you connect to a validating peer and enrol.
<@U1V6SJ1FF> Thanks you for your help answering : )
You’re welcome <@U31TA64TT> . So once you have the credentials locally stored, you need to hold on to those, as they can’t be retrieved again.
